Game.Name: Kidou Keisatsu Patlabor - 98-Shiki Kidou Seyo! (Japan)
Game.plot: Kidou Keisatsu Patlabor: 98-Shiki Kidou Seyo! is an Adventure game, published by Ma-Ba,which was released in Japan in 1992.
Game.Notes: Kidou Keisatsu Patlabor: 98-Shiki Kidou Seyo! (機動警察パトレイバー ９８式起動せよ！) is a 1992 Sega Mega Drive adventure game by Ma-Ba released exclusively in Japan tying into the Kidou Keisatsu Patlabor media franchise.
